author: Special Correspondent
text:
The State government on Thursday posted S.N. Seshasai, Commissioner of Police, Tirupur City, as the new Additional Commissioner of Police (North), Chennai Police, in the existing vacancy.

M.N. Manjunatha, Inspector-General of Police (North Zone) has been posted as the Commissioner of Police, Tirupur. K. Shankar, Inspector-General of Police (West Zone) has been posted as the Additional Commissioner of Police (South), Chennai Police, in the place of C. Sridhar posted as the IGP (West Zone).

IGP S. Davidson Devasirvatham has been posted as the IGP (Welfare) in the place of H.M. Jayaram posted as the Additional Commissioner of Police (Traffic), Chennai Police.

P. Thamaraikannan, who was heading the traffic wing in the city, is the new IGP (North Zone). IGP Sandeep Rai Rathore, who is back from Central deputation, has been posted as the IGP (Coastal Security Group), Chennai. IGP N.K. Senthamarai Kannan has been posted as the IGP (Central Zone) in the existing vacancy, according to an official release.
title: Chennai gets 3 new additional commissioners
